parsed_action.reasoning: With no recent events and moderate inventory, run a simple price test to gauge elasticity by category while protecting margin (cost $10). Electronics is typically price-sensitive, so a slight drop to $19.99 aims to boost conversion. Home Goods gets a modest increase to $20.99 to probe margin without heavily impacting demand. Apparel often tolerates higher markups; raising to $21.99 tests willingness to pay while maintaining healthy margin. Monitor sales velocity and conversion to iterate next tick.
